page.title: 10COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content: Dunstable has quite a lot of community services. There are two main churchs in the town centre, Priory which is the oldest church in Dunstable (built mid 12th century ) and the Methodist church. There are also at least four other churches in the area. The lesiure centre is very popular with nearly all the people in Dunstable. A range of facilities are available:- swimming, rollerskating, trampolining , gymnastics, bowling, weight training and many others. There are many organisations in Dunstable e.g. Cubs, Brownies & Youth clubs. For entertainment there are discos, bars & fast food services. Over all Dunstable is a very enjoyable place to live.
